title: Codename: Dragonfly
description: Paris. 2001. Secret agent Dragonfly is on assignment from the World Council to stop revolutionary leader Mr. E, currently based on the far-out side of the Moon.
altHero: Dragonfly is a beautiful woman resting on a clean, white surface that perfectly contours her body and head
alt1: a spaceship lands on the moon
alt2: a man in a beret speaks on a radio microphone, Earth can be seen outside the window
alt3: a man in all black approaches Dragonfly as she does some scantily-clad yoga
alt4: Dragonfly in a space suit confronts another Dragonfly dressed in all black
